channel.title: How do you change the hand that a sword is held to left hand? 562 r2hd will rep!
channel.description: I went to itemdefinition.xml and I changed some names to make things like a godsword one handed. Does anybody know how to make it so you hold the godsword with you shield hand?

item.title: How do you change the hand that a sword is held to left hand? 562 r2hd will rep!
item.dc:creator: @stevenlin598 stevenlin598
item.description:
@stevenlin598 wrote:

I went to itemdefinition.xml and I changed some names to make things like a godsword one handed. Does anybody know how to make it so you hold the godsword with you shield hand?

Read full topic
